com.gurunars.crud_item_list

Class CrudItemList<ItemType extends Item>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.RelativeLayout
          • com.gurunars.crud_item_list.CrudItemList<ItemType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class CrudItemList<ItemType extends Item>
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout
    Widget to be used for manipulating a collection of items.

      • setItems

        public void setItems(java.util.List<ItemType> items)
        Set a collection of items to be shown. If the collection of items is different - the diff shall be animated.
        Parameters:
        items - a new collection to be shown

        public void close()

      • registerItemType

        public void registerItemType(java.lang.Enum itemType,
                             SelectableItemViewBinder<ItemType> itemViewBinder,
                             int menuItemViewId,
                             NewItemSupplier<ItemType> newItemSupplier)
        Map item type to view binder responsible for rending items of this type.
        Parameters:
        itemType - type of the Items
        itemViewBinder - row renderer for the items of a given type
        menuItemViewId - id of the clickable item in creation menu
        newItemSupplier - supplier of blank new items
